## 1. 🥖 C.C.P FOURNIL — Boulangerie-Pâtisserie

### 1.1 Business Profile

| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Name** | C.C.P Fournil (Boulangerie Pâtisserie CCP Fournil) |
| **Type** | Boulangerie-Pâtisserie artisanale |
| **Address** | 34 Rue de Paris, 77200 Torcy |
| **Phone** | 01 60 05 28 84 |
| **Hours** | Lun-Dim: 6h30 – 20h00 (fermé mercredi) |
| **Google Rating** | ~4.5★ (5 avis on FranceBoulangerie) |
| **Founded** | 2014 (SAS, SIREN 804761856) |
| **Specialties** | Pain artisanal, pâtisserie, viennoiserie, traiteur, salon de thé, glaces, confiserie, chocolaterie |
| **Products** | Pain complet, pain campagne, pain levain, macarons, crêpes, glaces, quiches, pizzas, sandwichs, pièces montées, confiserie, chocolat |
| **Facilities** | Parking, accès handicapés |
| **Services** | Boissons à emporter, traiteur, pâtisserie sur commande |

### 1.2 Current Web Presence

| Platform | Status | Quality |
|----------|--------|---------|
| **Website** | ❌ None | — |
| **Facebook** | ✅ @BoulangeriePâtisserieCCPFournil (1,642 likes) | Active, decent presence |
| **Google Business** | ✅ Listed | Basic info, few reviews |
| **Pages Jaunes** | ✅ Listed | Standard directory listing |
| **Mappy** | ✅ Listed | Complete with hours |
| **Uber Eats** | ❌ Not listed | Missed opportunity |
| **myboulange.fr** | ✅ Listed as "Le Fournil" | Basic directory |

**Assessment:** Facebook is their primary online presence with 1,642 likes — decent for a local boulangerie. However, they have NO website, relying entirely on directories and Facebook. This is a major gap for a business with 10+ years of history and a wide product range.

### 1.3 Business Analysis

- **What makes them unique:** Very wide product range — not just bread but also traiteur, salon de thé, glaces, confiserie, chocolaterie. Essentially a one-stop gourmet shop.
- **Brand vibe:** Traditional artisan bakery with a modern twist. Family-oriented, neighborhood anchor.
- **Target clientele:** Local residents (Rue de Paris is a main commercial street), families, office workers for lunch (sandwiches, quiches), event planners (pièces montées).
- **Competitive positioning:** Strong location on Rue de Paris. Wide product range sets them apart from typical boulangeries. Open 7 days (except Wednesday) from 6h30.
- **Strengths:** Diversity of products, early opening, long history, good Facebook following.
- **Weaknesses:** No website, no online ordering, limited visibility beyond Facebook.

### 1.4 Website Proposal (PRP)

**Recommended site type:** Site vitrine avec catalogue produits

**Key Pages:**
1. **Accueil** — Hero with artisan bread/pastry imagery, daily specials
2. **Notre Boulangerie** — History since 2014, artisan philosophy, team
3. **Nos Produits** — Organized catalog: Pains, Pâtisseries, Viennoiseries, Traiteur, Glaces, Confiserie
4. **Sur Commande** — Pièces montées, gâteaux personnalisés, traiteur events
5. **Galerie** — Photo gallery of products and shop interior
6. **Horaires & Contact** — Map, hours, phone, contact form

**Design Direction:**
- **Colors:** Warm wheat/golden (#D4A373), chocolate brown (#6B4226), cream white (#FFF8F0)
- **Mood:** Chaleureux, artisanal, authentique — warm lighting, rustic wood textures
- **Typography:** Serif heading (Playfair Display), clean sans-serif body (Lato)
- **Style:** Rustic-elegant, lots of bread/pastry photography, warm tones

**Key Features:**
- 📸 Product gallery with categories
- 🎂 Order form for custom cakes/traiteur
- 📍 Interactive Google Maps embed
- ⏰ Opening hours widget (with "fermé mercredi" alert)
- 📱 Mobile-responsive (many customers check on-the-go)
- 🔗 Facebook integration / feed widget
- 📞 Click-to-call button (mobile)

**USPs to Highlight:**
- "Artisan depuis 2014" — established credibility
- Wide product range: "De la baguette au traiteur"
- Open 6 days, 6h30 start
- Made-to-order cakes and events catering
- Parking and handicap accessibility

**Suggested Tagline:**
> *"L'art du pain, le goût de la tradition — Votre boulangerie-pâtisserie au cœur de Torcy"*

### 1.5 Pitch Angle

**Pain points to address:**
1. "You have 1,642 Facebook followers but nowhere to send them for menus, ordering, or event inquiries"
2. "Customers searching 'boulangerie Torcy' on Google find directory listings — not YOUR story"
3. "Your traiteur and custom cake services need a proper showcase — Facebook posts get buried"
4. "A website works for you 24/7, even when you're up at 4am baking"

**Approach:** Walk in during a slow afternoon (~15h), bring a tablet with the mockup, order something. Show them how their competitors look online vs. how they could look.

### 1.6 Estimated Budget

| Component | Cost |
|-----------|------|
| Design & Development | €1,200 |
| Photography (if needed) | €200 |
| Content writing (FR) | €100 |
| **Total** | **€1,500** |
| Monthly hosting/maintenance | €30/month |

### 1.7 Template Reusability

**Bakery Template → Reuse for:**
- **#2 Le Belvédère** (same business type, different brand)
- **#12 Ambiance Gourmande** (same business type)
- Can also adapt for any boulangerie-pâtisserie in the region

**Adaptation cost:** €800 per business (new colors, branding, content)

**Assessment:** Very minimal web presence. The Uber Eats listing suggests a modern, snacking-oriented bakery concept. New ownership (2022) means they may be open to building their brand digitally.

### 2.3 Business Analysis

- **What makes them unique:** Hybrid boulangerie + snacking concept. They sell tacos alongside traditional pastries — unusual for a boulangerie. New ownership brings fresh energy.
- **Brand vibe:** Modern, youthful, casual dining + bakery hybrid. "Belvédère" suggests elevated views/aspirations.
- **Target clientele:** Young professionals, students, families in the Belvédère residential area. Uber Eats delivery users.
- **Competitive positioning:** Different from CCP Fournil (more traditional). Appeals to a younger, snacking-oriented crowd. Location on the Promenade suggests a more residential, community-focused area.
- **Strengths:** Uber Eats presence (modern delivery), diverse menu, new ownership = energy
- **Weaknesses:** No website, no clear branding, very new business

### 2.4 Website Proposal (PRP)

**Recommended site type:** Site vitrine avec menu et commande

1. **Accueil** — Hero split: Bakery on one side, Snacking on other
2. **Notre Concept** — The hybrid boulangerie-snacking story
3. **La Carte** — Full menu: Boulangerie, Pâtisserie, Snacking (tacos, sandwichs, salades)

- 📞 Click-to-call

- Fresh new concept under new ownership
- Delivery via Uber Eats
- Located in the Belvédère neighborhood

**Suggested Tagline:**

**Pain points:**
1. "You're already on Uber Eats — but when people Google you, they find nothing"
2. "New ownership needs a fresh digital identity to build the brand"
3. "Your hybrid bakery-snacking concept is unique — show it off!"
4. "Compete with the established boulangeries with a modern web presence"

| 🥉 9 | **Le Belvédère** (#2) | New ownership, modern concept, Uber Eats | MODERATE |
| 🥉 10 | **Allo Pizza** (#13) | 445 evaluations, no website, delivery focus | MODERATE |

**Phase 1 — Build 4 core templates:**
1. 🥖 **Bakery Template** → Deploy for #1, #2, #12
2. ✂️ **Salon/Coiffure Template** → Deploy for #5, #6, #8, #17, #19

**Phase 2 — Specialty templates:**

6. 🍫 **Artisan Food Template** → #14
7. 👓 **Optical/Medical Template** → #18
8. 🌸 **Florist Template** → #20

## Revenue Projection

| Scenario | # Clients | Avg. Revenue | Total |
|----------|----------|-------------|-------|
| Conservative (25% conversion) | 5 | €1,500 | €7,500 |
| Moderate (40% conversion) | 8 | €1,600 | €12,800 |
| Optimistic (60% conversion) | 12 | €1,700 | €20,400 |

Plus monthly maintenance contracts: 5-12 clients × €30/month = €150-360/month recurring.

## Key Talking Points for ALL Pitches

1. **"Votre concurrent a un site web, pas vous"** — competitive pressure
2. **"85% des consommateurs recherchent en ligne avant de visiter un commerce local"** — data-driven
3. **"Pas un coût, un investissement"** — ROI framing
4. **"On vous montre d'abord, vous payez après"** — our showcase strategy (low risk for them)
5. **"Si ça vous plaît, on l'adapte à votre marque. Sinon, aucune obligation"** — no commitment pitch

2. Start building templates (Bakery + Salon first)
3. Create showcase sites for top 5 prospects
4. Begin in-person prospecting with tablet presentations

# Book Writing + Seedream 5 Research Guide
## Amazon KDP, AI Comics Generation, Humanization Techniques

**Created:** February 26, 2026
**Purpose:** Guide for Amazon KDP publishing + AI comic generation

---

## Part 1: Amazon KDP (Kindle Direct Publishing)

### What is KDP?
Amazon's self-publishing platform for:
- Kindle ebooks
- Paperback (print-on-demand)
- Hardcover (limited)

### Revenue Model
| Format | Royalty | Delivery Fee |
|--------|---------|--------------|
| Ebook (<$2.99) | 35% | None |
| Ebook ($2.99-$9.99) | 70% | ~$0.15/MB |
| Ebook (>$9.99) | 35% | None |
| Paperback | 60% minus print cost | N/A |

### Most Profitable Niches 2024-2025
1. **Low/No Content Books**
   - Journals, planners, notebooks
   - Coloring books
   - Activity books for kids
   - Puzzle books (sudoku, word search)
   - Low competition, high volume

2. **Children's Books**
   - Picture books
   - Early readers
   - Educational content

3. **Comics/Graphic Novels**
   - Rising market
   - AI-assisted creation viable

4. **Specialized Non-Fiction**
   - How-to guides
   - Niche hobbies

---

## Part 2: Seedream 5 for Comic Generation

### What is Seedream 5?
ByteDance's flagship AI image generator (Feb 2026)

### Key Features for Comics
| Feature | Benefit |
|---------|---------|
| **Native 4K** | Print-ready resolution |
| **Character Consistency** | Maintain faces across panels |
| **Text Rendering** | Readable text in images |
| **Multi-turn Editing** | "Change jacket to red" |
| **Style Transfer** | Apply same art style |

### Pricing (Estimated)
| Plan | Cost | Credits |
|------|------|---------|
| Free Trial | $0 | Limited |
| Basic | ~$20/mo | 500 |
| Pro | ~$40/mo | 2000 |

### Comic Workflow with Seedream 5

**Step 1: Character Design**
```
Prompt: "Comic book character design sheet, 
young African girl, age 10, wearing blue school 
uniform, multiple angles, front view, side view, 
expression sheet, consistent character, 
clean line art, digital illustration"
```

**Step 2: Panel Generation**
```
Prompt: "Comic panel, scene: classroom, 
[character from reference] reading book, 
sunlight through window, warm colors, 
static shot, no text, 4K, detailed"
```

**Step 3: Speech Bubbles**
- Generate clean panel
- Add text in Photoshop/GIMP
- Or use Seedream's text capability

---

## Part 3: Humanization Techniques

### Why AI Content Gets Detected
1. Repetitive sentence patterns
2. Overly formal language
3. Lack of personal anecdotes
4. Predictable word choice
5. No natural "noise" (ums, asides)

### Humanization Techniques

**1. Add Personal Stories**
- Start chapters with personal experience
- Include specific details (dates, places, names)
- Share failures, not just wins

**2. Vary Sentence Structure**
- Mix short and long sentences
- Use fragments.
- Start sentences with "And" or "But"
- Break rules intentionally.

**3. Include Imperfections**
- Add typos then fix them
- Include colloquialisms
- Use contractions (we're, don't, can't)
- Write like you speak

**4. Add Deep Research**
- Quote real people
- Cite specific sources
- Include statistics with dates
- Reference current events

**5. Edit for Voice**
- Read aloud, mark awkward phrases
- Replace generic words: "good" → "solid," "killer," "surprisingly decent"
- Add transitional phrases: "Look," "Here's the thing," "Honestly"

**6. Use AI Detection Tools**
- Check with: GPTZero, Originality.ai, Copyleaks
- Rewrite flagged sections
- Aim under 30% AI probability

---

## Part 4: Book Writing Workflow

### Option A: Pure AI (Fastest)
1. Outline with ChatGPT/Claude
2. Generate chapters
3. Humanize content
4. Add personal touches
5. AI detection check
6. Format in Vellum/Atticus
7. Upload to KDP

**Time:** 1-2 weeks | **Quality:** Medium

### Option B: Hybrid (Recommended)
1. You provide core ideas/structure
2. AI drafts sections
3. You rewrite with your voice
4. AI assists with editing
5. Humanization pass
6. Formatting
7. Upload

**Time:** 3-4 weeks | **Quality:** High

### Option C: AI-Assisted (Most Human)
1. You write raw first draft
2. AI helps with research
3. AI suggests improvements
4. You decide what to change
5. AI catches errors
6. Final polish

**Time:** 6-8 weeks | **Quality:** Highest

---

## Part 5: Comic Book Creation Workflow

### Tools Stack
| Stage | Tool | Cost |
|-------|------|------|
| Writing | Scrivener / Google Docs | $50/$0 |
| Character Design | Seedream 5 | $20/mo |
| Panel Generation | Seedream 5 | Included |
| Layout | Comic Life / Clip Studio | $30/$50 |
| Text/Bubbles | Photoshop/GIMP | $20/$0 |
| Export | PDF for print | - |

### Step-by-Step Process

**Step 1: Script**
- Write panel-by-panel script
- Include: Panel description, dialogue, SFX

**Step 2: Character Sheets**
- Generate 5-10 key characters
- Save reference images
- Maintain consistency

**Step 3: Page Layout**
- Design panel grids
- Plan 22 pages (typical comic)

**Step 4: Generate Panels**
- Seedream 5 with character references
- Maintain art style consistency

**Step 5: Assembly**
- Import to Comic Life/Clip Studio
- Add speech bubbles
- Lettering and SFX

**Step 6: Export**
- PDF for KDP Print
- Epub for digital

---

## Part 6: Amazon KDP Best Practices

### Keywords
- Use all 7 backend keywords
- Include: genre, themes, audience
- Research with Publisher Rocket ($99)

### Categories
- Select 2 browse categories
- Email Amazon for additional categories post-launch

### Pricing
| Book Type | Recommended |
|-----------|-------------|
| Ebook Short | $2.99-4.99 |
| Ebook Full | $4.99-9.99 |
| Paperback | Cost + $4-8 |

### Launch Strategy
1. Pre-order (builds ranking)
2. Newsletter to existing audience
3. ARC (advanced review copies)
4. Launch day discount
5. Amazon Ads ($5-10/day)

---

## Tools & Resources

### Writing
- Scrivener ($50) - Long-form
- Atticus ($147) - Formatting + Writing
- Google Docs (free) - Collaboration

### AI Detection
- GPTZero (free tier)
- Originality.ai ($20/mo)
- Copyleaks

### Marketing
- BookBub (featured deals)
- Goodreads
- Amazon Ads

---

## Quick Start Checklist

- [ ] Choose book type (fiction/non-fiction/comic)
- [ ] Set up Amazon KDP account
- [ ] Research profitable niche
- [ ] Create outline
- [ ] Draft first chapter
- [ ] Generate comic panels (if applicable)
- [ ] Humanize content
- [ ] AI detection check
- [ ] Professional cover ($50-200)
- [ ] Format for KDP
- [ ] Upload and publish
- [ ] Launch marketing

---

## Cost Breakdown (First Book)

| Item | Cost |
|------|------|
| Seedream 5 (for comics) | $20/mo |
| AI Detection | $20/mo |
| Cover design | $50-200 |
| Formatting (optional) | $0-150 |
| ISBN (optional) | $0-125 |
| Marketing | $100-500 |
| **Minimum** | **~$200** |

---

Ready to start creating!

# French Administrative Forms Inventory

Comprehensive catalog of common French administrative forms (Cerfa) with numbers, URLs, and required data fields.

---

## 🧾 INCOME TAX FORMS (Impots.gouv.fr)

### Form 2042: Main Income Tax Return
- **Cerfa Number:** 10330*29 (year varies)
- **URL:** https://www.impots.gouv.fr/formulaire/2042/declaration-des-revenus
- **Platform:** impots.gouv.fr (online filing mandatory if internet-equipped)
- **Purpose:** Annual income declaration for all taxpayers
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Civil status: Name, first name, date/place of birth
  - Marital status and changes
  - Address and contact information
  - Tax household composition (dependents)
  - Employment income (wages, pensions)
  - Social security number (NIR)
  - Bank account details (RIB) for direct debit/refund
- **Annexes:**
  - 2042-C (complementary income: investments, capital gains)
  - 2042-C-PRO (professional income, BIC, BNC)
  - 2042-RICI (tax credits, deductions)
  - 2042-IOM (overseas income)

### Form 2044: Rental Income Declaration
- **Cerfa Number:** 10334*26
- **URL:** https://www.impots.gouv.fr/formulaire/2044/revenus-fonciers
- **Purpose:** Declaration of rental property income
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Property address and cadastral reference
  - Rental income received
  - Deductible expenses (repairs, management fees, property tax)
  - Loan interest payments
  - Co-owner percentage (if applicable)
  - Tenant information

### Form 2047: Foreign Income Declaration
- **Cerfa Number:** 11226*23
- **URL:** https://www.impots.gouv.fr/formulaire/2047/declaration-des-revenus-encaisses-letranger
- **Purpose:** Declaration of income earned abroad
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Country of income source
  - Nature of income (wages, pensions, rental, etc.)
  - Amount in foreign currency and euros
  - Taxes paid abroad
  - Tax treaty provisions applicable

### Form 6660: Property Tax Return
- **Cerfa Number:** 10517*21
- **URL:** https://www.impots.gouv.fr/formulaire/6660-rev/declaration-pour-lannee
- **Purpose:** Annual property tax declaration for changes
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Property identification (cadastral reference)
  - Nature of changes (construction, demolition, change of use)
  - Effective date of change
  - Property characteristics (surface area, rooms)

---

## 👨‍👩‍👧 CAF FORMS (Caisse d'Allocations Familiales)

### Cerfa 11423: General CAF Benefits Application
- **Cerfa Number:** 11423*07
- **URL:** https://www.caf.fr/allocataires/aides-et-demarches/les-formulaires
- **Platform:** caf.fr (online preferred)
- **Purpose:** Application for family allowances, housing benefits, RSA
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Full civil status of all household members
  - Social security numbers (NIR)
  - Address and housing situation
  - Family composition (children, dates of birth)
  - Income information (wages, pensions, benefits)
  - Bank details (RIB)
  - Employment status
  - Childcare arrangements (if applicable)

### Cerfa 14129: Housing Benefit Application (APL/ALF/ALS)
- **Cerfa Number:** 14129*03
- **URL:** https://www.caf.fr/allocataires/aides-et-demarches/aides-au-logement
- **Purpose:** Apply for housing assistance
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Complete address of housing
  - Lease details (landlord, rent amount, charges)
  - Housing type (apartment, house, student housing)
  - Surface area in m²
  - Monthly rent and charges breakdown
  - Landlord's SIRET or tax number (if landlord not individual)
  - Date of entry into housing
  - Household income (last 2 years)
  - Bank details (RIB)
  - Energy performance certificate (DPE) information

### Cerfa 15481: RSA Application (Revenu de Solidarité Active)
- **Cerfa Number:** 15481*01
- **URL:** https://www.caf.fr/allocataires/aides-et-demarches/les-formulaires
- **Purpose:** Apply for minimum income support
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Complete household composition
  - All income sources (last 3 months)
  - Bank account information
  - Employment history and status
  - Job search registration (Pôle Emploi)
  - Assets and property owned
  - Vehicle information
  - Housing costs

### Cerfa 11361: Child Declaration for Family Allowances
- **Cerfa Number:** 11361*04
- **URL:** https://www.caf.fr/allocataires/aides-et-demarches/les-formulaires
- **Purpose:** Declare a newborn or new child in household
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Child's full name, date and place of birth
  - Birth certificate details
  - Relationship to household
  - Other parent's information (if applicable)
  - Custody arrangements
  - Childcare costs and arrangements

### Cerfa 14000: Quarterly Resource Declaration (RSA/Prime d'activité)
- **Cerfa Number:** 14000*02
- **Purpose:** Quarterly income declaration for RSA recipients
- **Platform:** caf.fr (online mandatory)
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - All income received in past 3 months (by month)
  - Employment status changes
  - Hours worked
  - Sick leave or unemployment periods
  - Other benefits received

---

## 💼 URSSAF FORMS (Social Security Contributions)

### Cerfa P0 PL: Liberal Profession Business Registration
- **Cerfa Number:** 11768*06
- **URL:** https://www.autoentrepreneur.urssaf.fr/ or https://formalites.entreprises.gouv.fr/
- **Purpose:** Register as liberal professional/auto-entrepreneur
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Personal information (name, birth date/place, address)
  - Social security number
  - Business activity description (APE code)
  - Business address
  - Start date of activity
  - Choice of tax regime
  - VAT regime option
  - ACRE (social security exemption) request
  - Bank details (RIB)
  - Professional qualification certificates

### Cerfa P2-P4: Business Modification/Cessation
- **Cerfa Number:** 11678*03 (modification), 11679*03 (cessation)
- **URL:** https://formalites.entreprises.gouv.fr/
- **Purpose:** Declare changes or closure of business
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - SIRET number
  - Nature of change (address, activity, name)
  - Effective date
  - Reason for cessation (if applicable)
  - Final revenue declaration

### Déclaration de Chiffre d'Affaires (Auto-Entrepreneur)
- **No Cerfa:** Online form only
- **URL:** https://www.autoentrepreneur.urssaf.fr/
- **Frequency:** Monthly or quarterly
- **Purpose:** Declare revenue and pay social contributions
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Period covered
  - Total revenue by activity category
  - Revenue at zero if no activity (must still declare)
  - VAT amount collected (if applicable)

---

## 🆔 IDENTITY & LIFE EVENT FORMS (Service-Public.fr)

### Cerfa 12100: National ID Card Application
- **Cerfa Number:** 12100*02
- **URL:** https://www.service-public.fr/particuliers/vosdroits/R1073
- **Purpose:** Apply for or renew national identity card
- **Pre-application:** Online pre-application mandatory (ANTS)
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Full civil status
  - Address
  - Parent information (for minors)
  - Previous ID details (if renewal)
  - Reason for request (first time, renewal, loss, theft)
  - Emergency contact
- **Supporting documents needed:**
  - Birth certificate (< 3 months)
  - Proof of residence
  - 2 photos
  - Previous ID

### Cerfa 12100: Passport Application
- **Cerfa Number:** 12100*02 (same form as ID card)
- **URL:** https://www.service-public.fr/particuliers/vosdroits/R42218
- **Pre-application:** Online (ANTS)
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Same as ID card application
  - Travel document history
  - Height, eye color
- **Note:** Tax stamp (timbre fiscal) required - purchased online

### Cerfa 14948: Driver's License Exchange
- **Cerfa Number:** 14948*01
- **URL:** https://www.service-public.fr/particuliers/vosdroits/R23165
- **Platform:** ANTS (online only)
- **Purpose:** Exchange foreign license for French
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Original license details (number, country, issue date)
  - License categories held
  - Address in France
  - Duration of residence in France
  - Translation (if non-EU license)

### Cerfa 15725: Birth Declaration
- **Cerfa Number:** 15725*02
- **URL:** In-person at town hall (mairie)
- **Deadline:** 5 days from birth
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Child's name (first and last names)
  - Date, time, and place of birth
  - Gender
  - Parent information (names, occupations, addresses)
  - Marital status of parents
  - Witness information (if applicable)

### Cerfa 15725: PACS Declaration
- **Cerfa Number:** 15726*02
- **URL:** https://www.service-public.fr/particuliers/vosdroits/R46735
- **Purpose:** Register a civil partnership
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Partners' full civil status
  - Address(es)
  - Previous marital status
  - Property regime choice
  - Convention of PACS (attached document)
  - Signatures of both partners

### Cerfa 11530: Marriage Publication
- **Cerfa Number:** 11530*03
- **Purpose:** Request publication of marriage banns
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Future spouses' information
  - Chosen date and location
  - Witness information (2-4 witnesses)
  - Previous marital status
  - Prenuptial agreement details (if applicable)

### Cerfa 13750: Change of Address Notification
- **Cerfa Number:** 13750*05
- **URL:** https://www.service-public.fr/particuliers/vosdroits/R15248
- **Purpose:** Single form to notify multiple administrations
- **Platform:** service-public.fr
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Old address
  - New address
  - Effective date of move
  - Contact information
  - Services to notify (checkboxes)
  - Tax number
  - Social security number

---

## 🚗 VEHICLE & DRIVER FORMS (ANTS)

### Cerfa 13750: Vehicle Registration
- **Cerfa Number:** 13750*07
- **URL:** https://immatriculation.ants.gouv.fr/
- **Purpose:** Register a new or used vehicle
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Vehicle identification (VIN)
  - Make, model, year
  - Purchase date and price
  - Previous owner information
  - Buyer information and address
  - Certificate of sale (certificat de cession)

### Cerfa 13753: Vehicle Sale Declaration
- **Cerfa Number:** 13754*03
- **URL:** https://www.service-public.fr/particuliers/vosdroits/R13592
- **Purpose:** Declare sale/transfer of vehicle
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Vehicle registration number
  - VIN
  - Seller and buyer information
  - Sale date and price
  - Odometer reading
  - Signatures

---

## 🏠 PROPERTY & HOUSING FORMS

### Cerfa 13467: Property Tax Declaration for New Construction
- **Cerfa Number:** 13467*04
- **URL:** https://www.impots.gouv.fr/formulaire/h1/declaration-modele-h1
- **Deadline:** 90 days after completion
- **Purpose:** Declare new construction or major renovation
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Property address and cadastral reference
  - Owner information
  - Construction completion date
  - Surface areas (living space, annexes)
  - Construction costs
  - Building characteristics (floors, materials, equipment)

### Cerfa 10862: Lease Agreement (Contrat de Location)
- **Cerfa Number:** 10862*07
- **URL:** https://www.service-public.fr/particuliers/vosdroits/R16186
- **Purpose:** Standard residential lease
- **Required Data Fields:**
  - Landlord and tenant information
  - Property address and description
  - Rent amount and payment terms
  - Charges (breakdown)
  - Deposit amount
  - Lease duration
  - Special conditions
  - Diagnostics (DPE, asbestos, lead, etc.)

---

## 📋 COMMON DATA FIELDS ACROSS FORMS

Most French administrative forms require these standard fields:

### Personal Identification
- **Nom de famille** (surname/family name)
- **Nom d'usage** (maiden name or chosen name)
- **Prénom(s)** (first name(s) in order)
- **Date de naissance** (date of birth: DD/MM/YYYY)
- **Lieu de naissance** (place: commune/ville + département/pays)
- **Nationalité** (nationality)
- **Numéro de sécurité sociale** (NIR - 15 digits)

### Contact Information
- **Adresse complète** (full address)
  - Numéro et nom de rue
  - Code postal (5 digits)
  - Commune/Ville
- **Téléphone** (mobile and/or landline)
- **Adresse électronique** (email)

### Financial
- **RIB** (Bank details - IBAN, BIC)
- **Numéro fiscal** (tax number - 13 digits)
- **Avis d'imposition** (tax notice reference)

### Family
- **Situation familiale** (marital status):
  - Célibataire (single)
  - Marié(e) (married)
  - Pacsé(e) (civil partnership)
  - Divorcé(e) (divorced)
  - Veuf/Veuve (widowed)
- **Nombre de personnes à charge** (dependents)
- **Livret de famille** (family record book number)

---

## 🔗 PLATFORM LINKS

- **Impots.gouv.fr:** https://www.impots.gouv.fr/accueil
- **CAF:** https://www.caf.fr/
- **URSSAF Auto-Entrepreneur:** https://www.autoentrepreneur.urssaf.fr/
- **Service-Public.fr:** https://www.service-public.fr/
- **ANTS (Documents):** https://ants.gouv.fr/
- **Guichet Entreprises:** https://formalites.entreprises.gouv.fr/
- **Ameli (Health):** https://www.ameli.fr/
- **France Travail:** https://www.francetravail.fr/

---

## ⚠️ IMPORTANT NOTES

1. **Cerfa numbers change:** The number after the asterisk (*) is the version and updates regularly
2. **Online priority:** Many forms are now online-only; paper versions being phased out
3. **FranceConnect:** Most platforms require FranceConnect authentication
4. **Supporting documents:** Forms often require supporting documents (justificatifs)
5. **Prefilled data:** Tax and CAF forms increasingly prefill based on previous declarations
6. **Mobile apps:** Most services have mobile apps (Impots.gouv, Ameli, CAF, ANTS)

files.content:
# French Administrative Obligations Catalog

Comprehensive list of major French administrative obligations for residents and businesses.

---

## 📊 TAX OBLIGATIONS (Impôts)

### Income Tax (Impôt sur le Revenu)
- **Frequency:** Annual
- **Filing Period:** April-May (online) for previous year's income
  - Paper deadline: Mid-May (national)
  - Online deadlines (zone-based):
    - Départements 1-19: Late May
    - Départements 20-54: Early June
    - Départements 55+: Mid-June
- **Payment:** Monthly installments (prélèvement à la source) or balance due in September
- **Penalties if missed:**
  - 10% late filing penalty
  - 0.2% monthly interest on unpaid amounts
  - Up to 40% penalty for repeated non-compliance
- **Required documents:**
  - Previous year's tax notice (avis d'imposition)
  - Income statements (salaries, pensions, rental income)
  - Proof of deductions (childcare, donations, home improvements)
  - Bank account details (RIB) for refunds/debits

### Property Tax (Taxe Foncière)
- **Frequency:** Annual
- **Deadline:** Mid-October (online payment deadline ~October 20)
- **Payment:** Lump sum or monthly installments
- **Penalties if missed:**
  - 10% surcharge on unpaid amount
  - 0.4% monthly interest
- **Required documents:**
  - Property deed/ownership proof
  - Cadastral information
  - Bank details for payment

### Residence Tax on Second Homes (Taxe d'Habitation)
- **Frequency:** Annual
- **Deadline:** December 15-20
- **Payment:** Lump sum or installments
- **Note:** Primary residence tax abolished for most households (2023+)
- **Penalties if missed:**
  - 10% surcharge
  - Interest charges
- **Required documents:**
  - Proof of residence status (primary vs secondary)
  - Occupancy details

---

## 🏥 SOCIAL SECURITY OBLIGATIONS

### Health Insurance - CPAM (Assurance Maladie)
- **Registration:** Mandatory within 3 months of arrival/birth
- **Annual:** No annual filing, but update changes within 1 month
- **Key Events Requiring Notification:**
  - Change of address: Within 1 month
  - Change of employment: Within 1 month
  - Addition of beneficiaries: Within 1 month
- **Penalties if missed:**
  - Loss of healthcare coverage
  - Reimbursement delays
  - Potential retroactive payment of medical costs
- **Required documents:**
  - Birth certificate
  - Proof of residence
  - Social security number
  - Employment contract or proof of status

### Family Allowance Fund - CAF (Caisse d'Allocations Familiales)
- **Initial Application:** Within 3 months of qualifying event
- **Quarterly Income Declaration:** Every 3 months for RSA/prime d'activité recipients
- **Annual Resource Declaration:** January-February for previous year
- **Penalties if missed:**
  - Benefit suspension or reduction
  - Overpayment recovery (with interest)
  - Administrative fines
- **Required documents:**
  - Tax notice (avis d'imposition)
  - Birth certificates of children
  - Proof of residence (lease, utility bills)
  - Bank details (RIB)
  - Income statements (payslips)

### URSSAF (Social Contributions for Self-Employed)
- **Frequency:** Monthly or quarterly
- **Declaration:** Online via urssaf.fr or autoentrepreneur.urssaf.fr
- **Deadlines:** Varies by regime
  - Auto-entrepreneurs: Monthly (end of month) or quarterly
  - Liberal professions: Monthly/quarterly installments
- **Penalties if missed:**
  - 5% late payment penalty
  - 0.2% interest per month
  - Potential loss of social protection
- **Required documents:**
  - Revenue/turnover statements
  - SIRET number
  - Bank details

---

## 🪪 IDENTITY DOCUMENTS

### National Identity Card (Carte Nationale d'Identité - CNI)
- **Validity:** 15 years (adults), 10 years (minors)
- **Renewal:** No specific deadline, but must be valid for certain procedures
- **Processing Time:** 4-6 weeks typically
- **Penalties if missed:**
  - No direct penalty, but expired ID may prevent travel/administrative acts
- **Required documents:**
  - Birth certificate (less than 3 months old)
  - Proof of residence
  - Previous ID card
  - 2 passport photos
  - Tax stamp (timbre fiscal) - €25 if lost/stolen

### Passport (Passeport)
- **Validity:** 10 years (adults), 5 years (minors)
- **Renewal:** No specific deadline
- **Processing Time:** 2-4 weeks (varies by season)
- **Cost:** €86 (adult), €42 (minor 15-17), €17 (under 15)
- **Required documents:**
  - National ID card or birth certificate
  - Proof of residence
  - 2 passport photos
  - Tax stamp (timbre fiscal)

### Driver's License (Permis de Conduire)
- **Validity:** Unlimited for paper licenses; 15 years for new format
- **Exchange:** EU licenses valid indefinitely; non-EU must exchange within 1 year
- **Renewal:** Medical exam required at certain ages or for specific categories
- **Penalties if missed:**
  - Driving with expired foreign license: €35 fine + license suspension
- **Required documents:**
  - Proof of residence
  - Medical certificate (if required)
  - Previous license
  - Photos

---

## 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 LIFE EVENTS (Événements de Vie)

### Birth Declaration
- **Deadline:** Within 5 days of birth (3 days if born at home)
- **Where:** Town hall (mairie) of birth location
- **Penalties if missed:**
  - Criminal penalty (rare, but legally possible)
  - Complications for obtaining official documents
- **Required documents:**
  - Birth certificate from hospital
  - Parents' ID cards
  - Family record book (livret de famille) if exists
  - Marriage certificate (if applicable)

### Marriage (Mariage)
- **Notification:** Publication of banns 10 days before
- **Registration:** Immediate (day of ceremony)
- **Subsequent Updates Required:**
  - Tax authorities: Next tax filing
  - Social security: Within 1 month
  - CAF: Within 1 month
- **Required documents:**
  - Birth certificates (less than 3 months old)
  - Proof of residence
  - List of witnesses
  - Prenuptial agreement (if applicable)

### PACS (Civil Partnership)
- **Registration:** At town hall or notary
- **Updates Required:** Same as marriage (taxes, social security, CAF)
- **Dissolution:** Notify registering authority
- **Required documents:**
  - Birth certificates
  - Proof of residence
  - Joint declaration of PACS
  - ID documents

### Change of Address
- **Deadline:** No legal deadline, but recommended within 1 month
- **Entities to Notify:**
  - Tax authorities (impots.gouv.fr)
  - Social security (ameli.fr)
  - CAF (caf.fr)
  - Driver's license (ANTS)
  - Employer
  - Banks, insurance, utilities
- **Penalties if missed:**
  - Missed official correspondence
  - Service interruptions
  - Invalid license address (€135 fine if stopped by police)
- **Required documents:**
  - New proof of residence (lease, utility bill, property deed)

### Death Declaration
- **Deadline:** Within 24 hours
- **Where:** Town hall of death location
- **Required documents:**
  - Death certificate from doctor
  - Deceased's ID documents
  - Family record book

---

## 💼 BUSINESS OBLIGATIONS

### Auto-Entrepreneur (Micro-Entreprise)

#### Registration
- **Deadline:** Before starting activity
- **Portal:** autoentrepreneur.urssaf.fr or guichet-entreprises.fr
- **Required documents:**
  - ID card
  - Proof of residence
  - Professional qualification certificates (for regulated activities)

#### Revenue Declaration
- **Frequency:** Monthly or quarterly (chosen at registration)
- **Deadlines:**
  - Monthly: Last day of each month
  - Quarterly: End of April, July, October, January
- **Penalties if missed:**
  - €58 penalty per late declaration
  - 5% penalty on contributions due
  - 0.2% monthly interest

#### Annual Declaration
- **When:** April-May (income tax return)
- **Purpose:** Income tax calculation
- **Penalties:** Same as income tax penalties

### VAT (TVA - Taxe sur la Valeur Ajoutée)
- **Threshold (2024):**
  - Services: €36,800 (franchise applies below)
  - Goods: €91,900 (franchise applies below)
- **Declaration Frequency:**
  - Above thresholds: Monthly or quarterly
  - CA12 form: Annually if exempt
- **Deadlines:**
  - Monthly: 24th of following month
  - Quarterly: 24th of month following quarter
- **Penalties if missed:**
  - 10% of tax due (minimum €15)
  - Interest charges
- **Required documents:**
  - Purchase and sales invoices
  - VAT-compliant invoices (with VAT number)

### CFE (Cotisation Foncière des Entreprises)
- **Frequency:** Annual
- **Deadline:** December 15
- **First Year:** Exempt
- **Penalties if missed:**
  - 10% surcharge
  - Interest charges
- **Required documents:**
  - Declaration of business premises (form 1447-C) in first year
  - Surface area of professional premises

### Social Declarations (DSN)
- **For Employers:** Monthly social security declarations
- **Deadline:** 5th or 15th of following month (depending on size)
- **Platform:** net-entreprises.fr
- **Penalties:** Significant fines for late/missing declarations

---

## 📅 ANNUAL CALENDAR SUMMARY

### January
- Quarterly VAT (if applicable)
- CFE balance payment (if installments)

### February
- CAF annual resource declaration begins

### April-May
- **Income tax declaration season** (CRITICAL)
- Auto-entrepreneur annual income declaration

### June
- Final income tax filing deadline (online, zone 3)

### July
- Quarterly VAT
- Quarterly URSSAF (if applicable)

### September
- Income tax balance payment (if applicable)

### October
- Property tax payment deadline (~Oct 20)
- Quarterly VAT
- Quarterly URSSAF

### December
- CFE payment deadline (Dec 15)
- Residence tax on second homes (Dec 20)

---

## ⚠️ CRITICAL NOTES

1. **FranceConnect Required:** Most online services require FranceConnect authentication
2. **Online Priority:** Paper forms increasingly deprecated; online filing often mandatory
3. **Automatic Updates:** Many services share data automatically; still verify accuracy
4. **Prescription Periods:** Tax authorities can audit 3 years back (6 for serious omissions)
5. **Foreign Residents:** Different rules/deadlines may apply for non-residents

---

*Last Updated: February 2026*
*Sources: impots.gouv.fr, service-public.fr, ameli.fr, caf.fr, urssaf.fr*

# French Administrative Platform Technical Analysis

Technical analysis of major French government platforms for automation compatibility, API availability, and authentication requirements.

---

## 🔐 FRANCECONNECT - Identity Federation System

### Overview
FranceConnect is France's national identity federation system that allows citizens to use existing credentials from one service (Impots.gouv, Ameli, La Poste Identity) to authenticate to other government services.

### Technical Architecture
- **Type:** OpenID Connect (OIDC) based federation
- **Identity Providers (IdP):**
  - Impots.gouv.fr (DGFiP)
  - Ameli.fr (Assurance Maladie)
  - L'Identité Numérique La Poste
  - MSA (agricultural social security)
  - France Identité (national digital identity app)
  - MobileConnect et moi
  - YRIS
  - TrustMe

### For Service Providers
- **Integration:** Required for most government services
- **API Documentation:** https://partenaires.franceconnect.gouv.fr/
- **Access:** Restricted to:
  - Public administrations
  - Local authorities
  - Private companies with public service missions
- **Process:**
  1. Request access via franceconnect.gouv.fr
  2. Provide legal documentation
  3. Technical integration (OAuth 2.0 / OpenID Connect)
  4. Testing in sandbox environment
  5. Production approval

### API Capabilities
- **Identity verification:** Name, first name, birth date/place
- **Data retrieval:** Via "API FranceConnectées" (see below)
- **No automation for end users:** FranceConnect is for service providers, not for automating user actions

### Automation Feasibility
- ❌ **Cannot be automated for form-filling:** FranceConnect requires real user authentication
- ✅ **Can be integrated:** If building a registered service
- ⚠️ **User must authenticate:** Each session requires actual user login

---

## 💰 IMPOTS.GOUV.FR - Tax Administration

### Platform Details
- **URL:** https://www.impots.gouv.fr/
- **Authority:** DGFiP (Direction Générale des Finances Publiques)
- **Mobile App:** Yes (iOS, Android)

### Authentication
- **FranceConnect:** ✅ Required for most services
- **Direct login:** Username/password (fiscal number + password)
- **2FA:** Increasingly required for sensitive operations

### API Availability

#### For Individuals - NO PUBLIC API
- ❌ **No public API** for individuals to automate their own tax filing
- ❌ **No official scraping allowed** (Terms of Service prohibit automation)
- ⚠️ **Anti-bot measures:** CAPTCHA, rate limiting, session fingerprinting

#### For Service Providers - LIMITED APIs

**1. API Impôt Particulier** (via API Particulier)
- **Purpose:** Retrieve tax data WITH user consent
- **Access:** Authorized administrations and services only
- **URL:** https://api.gouv.fr/les-api/impot-particulier
- **FranceConnect:** Required (user must authenticate)
- **Data provided:**
  - Tax notice (avis d'imposition)
  - Tax household income (revenu fiscal de référence)
  - Tax amount
  - Number of dependents
- **Use case:** Third parties verifying user income for loans, benefits, etc.
- **NOT for:** Automated form filling by users themselves

**2. API Particulier**
- **URL:** https://particulier.api.gouv.fr/
- **Purpose:** Aggregate API for multiple government data sources
- **Includes:** Tax data, CAF data, Pôle Emploi data
- **Access:** Authorized organizations only (must apply)
- **User consent:** Required via FranceConnect
- **Rate limits:** Yes
- **Cost:** Free for eligible public services

### Form Submission
- **Online filing:** Mandatory if internet access available
- **Platform:** Web-based form on impots.gouv.fr
- **Prefilled data:** Tax returns increasingly prefilled
- **Automation:**
  - ❌ Direct automation: Prohibited
  - ❌ Scraping: Against ToS and technically prevented
  - ⚠️ Manual only: User must log in and submit

### Technical Barriers
- CAPTCHA on login and sensitive operations
- Session tokens with short expiration
- Browser fingerprinting
- IP-based rate limiting
- Terms of Service prohibit automated access

### Automation Verdict
- ❌ **User automation:** NOT POSSIBLE (and illegal)
- ✅ **Service provider integration:** Possible with authorization
- ⚠️ **Recommended approach:** Assist user with data collection, user submits manually

---

## 🏥 AMELI.FR - Health Insurance (CPAM)

### Platform Details
- **URL:** https://www.ameli.fr/
- **Authority:** CNAM (Caisse Nationale d'Assurance Maladie)
- **Mobile App:** Yes (iOS, Android) - "Ameli"

### Authentication
- **FranceConnect:** ✅ Supported
- **Direct login:** Social security number + password
- **2FA:** Available (recommended)

### API Availability

#### For Service Providers - YES (Limited)

**1. API Droits à l'Assurance Maladie**
- **URL:** https://api.gouv.fr/les-api/api_ameli_droits_cnam
- **Purpose:** Verify health insurance coverage
- **FranceConnect:** Required
- **Data provided:**
  - Coverage status (yes/no)
  - Start/end dates of coverage
  - Regime type
  - Beneficiaries in household
- **Access:** Authorized organizations only
- **Use case:** Verify patient coverage before care

**2. API Indemnités Journalières**
- **URL:** https://api.gouv.fr/les-api/api-indemnites-journalieres-cnam
- **Purpose:** Retrieve daily sickness benefit amounts
- **FranceConnect:** Required
- **Access:** Restricted to authorized services

**3. API Complémentaire Santé Solidaire (C2S)**
- **Purpose:** Check C2S eligibility
- **Via:** API Particulier
- **Access:** Authorized services only

### For Individual Users - NO API
- ❌ No public API for personal use
- ❌ Automation prohibited in Terms of Service

### Common Operations
- View reimbursements (décomptes)
- Download attestations (coverage certificates)
- Update personal information
- Order European Health Insurance Card (CEAM)

### Technical Barriers
- Login CAPTCHA
- Session management
- Anti-scraping measures
- Terms of Service against automation

### Automation Verdict
- ❌ **User automation:** NOT POSSIBLE
- ✅ **Service provider data retrieval:** Possible with authorization
- ⚠️ **Recommended:** Manual access only

---

## 👶 CAF.FR - Family Allowance Fund

### Platform Details
- **URL:** https://www.caf.fr/
- **Mobile App:** Yes (iOS, Android) - "Caf - Mon Compte"
- **Geographic:** Network of local CAF offices (departmental)

### Authentication
- **FranceConnect:** ✅ Supported
- **Direct login:** Allocataire number + password
- **Login varies:** By département (local CAF sites)

### API Availability

#### For Service Providers - PLANNED

**1. API Quotient Familial** (In development)
- **Status:** Specification phase (as of 2024-2026)
- **Purpose:** Retrieve family quotient (QF)
- **FranceConnect:** Will be required
- **Data planned:**
  - Family quotient (QF)
  - Household composition
  - Benefit eligibility
- **Access:** Authorized organizations (municipalities, schools, etc.)
- **Use case:** Determine tariffs for daycare, school meals, activities

**2. Via API Particulier**
- **Current availability:** Limited CAF data via API Particulier
- **URL:** https://particulier.api.gouv.fr/
- **Data available:**
  - Family composition (limited)
  - Housing benefit status
  - RSA recipient status
- **Access:** Authorized organizations only

### For Individual Users - NO API
- ❌ No public API for personal automation
- ❌ Terms of Service prohibit scraping

### Common Operations
- Apply for benefits (online forms)
- Quarterly income declarations (RSA, Prime d'activité)
- Upload supporting documents
- Download attestations (benefit statements)
- Update family situation

### Technical Challenges
- Decentralized: Each département has separate portal
- Different URLs: cafXX.fr (where XX = département number)
- CAPTCHA on login
- Document upload required (scans)
- Complex multi-step forms

### Automation Verdict
- ❌ **User automation:** NOT POSSIBLE
- ⚠️ **Future API:** May become available for authorized services
- 📝 **Current state:** Manual only, document-heavy

---

## 🏢 AUTOENTREPRENEUR.URSSAF.FR - Self-Employed

### Platform Details
- **URL:** https://www.autoentrepreneur.urssaf.fr/
- **Authority:** URSSAF (Union de Recouvrement des Cotisations de Sécurité Sociale et d'Allocations Familiales)
- **Mobile App:** Yes - "AutoEntrepreneur Urssaf"

### Authentication
- **FranceConnect:** ✅ Supported
- **Direct login:** SIRET + password

### API Availability

#### For Individual Auto-Entrepreneurs - NO PUBLIC API
- ❌ No public API for declaring revenue
- ❌ Automation prohibited

#### For Software Providers - YES (Certified Software)

**"Logiciel de Tenue de Caisse"**
- **Requirement:** Since 2018, certain businesses need certified accounting software
- **Certification:** LNE (Laboratoire National de Métrologie et d'Essais)
- **Purpose:** Anti-fraud measure for cash-based businesses
- **Integration:** Certified software can interface with URSSAF systems
- **Access:** Software vendors must be certified

**Partner Software:**
- Several commercial partners integrate with URSSAF
- Examples: Indy, Shine, Freebe, Tiime, Pennylane
- Integration allows semi-automated declarations
- Still requires user review and approval

### Common Operations
- Monthly/quarterly revenue declaration
- Social contribution payment
- View contribution history
- Download attestations (URSSAF compliance certificates)
- Update business information

### Technical Details
- Simple interface (compared to other platforms)
- Revenue declaration is straightforward (3 fields typically)
- Declarations must be submitted even if revenue = 0
- Late declarations incur penalties automatically

### Automation Verdict
- ❌ **Direct user automation:** NOT ALLOWED
- ⚠️ **Via certified software:** Possible if using partner platforms
- 📊 **Data export:** Users can export payment history
- 🔌 **Recommendation:** Integrate with partner accounting software

---

## 🏛️ SERVICE-PUBLIC.FR - Unified Portal

### Platform Details
- **URL:** https://www.service-public.fr/
- **Purpose:** Information portal + procedural aggregator
- **Authority:** DILA (Direction de l'Information Légale et Administrative)

### Functionality
- ✅ Information resource (not a transactional platform)
- ✅ Links to actual service portals
- ✅ Form downloads
- ✅ Procedural guidance

### API - NONE
- No APIs (it's a documentation/portal site)
- Links redirect to actual platforms (ANTS, Impots, CAF, etc.)

### Automation
- N/A - Not a transactional platform

---

## 🪪 ANTS.GOUV.FR - National Agency for Secure Documents

### Platform Details
- **URL:** https://ants.gouv.fr/
- **Services:**
  - Driver's license
  - Vehicle registration (carte grise)
  - Passport
  - National ID card

### Authentication
- **FranceConnect:** ✅ Required for most services
- **No direct login:** Must use FranceConnect

### API Availability
- ❌ **No public API**
- ❌ **No automation allowed**

### Process
- Pre-application online
- Upload documents (photos, scans)
- Appointment scheduling (for ID documents)
- In-person validation (biometrics for passports/ID)

### Technical Barriers
- Document upload required (photos, scans)
- CAPTCHA
- Appointment booking (physical presence needed)
- Biometric data collection in person

### Automation Verdict
- ❌ **Not automatable** (requires physical presence + biometrics)
- 📤 **Can assist:** Prepare documents, fill forms, schedule appointment
- 👤 **User must:** Appear in person for ID documents

---

## 📊 SUMMARY MATRIX

| Platform | Public API | Service Provider API | FranceConnect Required | Automation Feasible | Manual Only Operations |
|----------|-----------|---------------------|----------------------|-------------------|----------------------|
| **Impots.gouv.fr** | ❌ No | ✅ Yes (read-only, with consent) | ✅ Yes | ❌ No | Tax filing, payments |
| **Ameli.fr** | ❌ No | ✅ Yes (limited, read-only) | ✅ Yes | ❌ No | All operations |
| **CAF.fr** | ❌ No | ⚠️ In development | ✅ Yes | ❌ No | Applications, declarations |
| **AutoEntrepreneur.URSSAF** | ❌ No | ⚠️ Via certified software | ✅ Yes | ⚠️ Limited (via partners) | Revenue declarations |
| **ANTS.gouv.fr** | ❌ No | ❌ No | ✅ Yes | ❌ No | All (requires in-person) |
| **Service-Public.fr** | ❌ N/A | ❌ N/A | ❌ N/A | ❌ N/A | Information only |

---

## 🤖 AUTOMATION STRATEGIES & RECOMMENDATIONS

### ❌ What CANNOT Be Automated (Legally & Technically)

1. **Tax filing for individuals** (Impots.gouv.fr)
   - Prohibited by Terms of Service
   - Technical anti-bot measures
   - Legal liability for errors

2. **Health insurance claims** (Ameli.fr)
   - No API for individual use
   - Anti-scraping protections

3. **CAF benefit applications**
   - Complex, document-heavy processes
   - No automation APIs
   - Fraud prevention measures

4. **Identity documents** (ANTS)
   - Requires physical presence
   - Biometric data collection

### ⚠️ What CAN Be Semi-Automated

1. **Data aggregation** (read-only)
   - IF building an authorized service
   - Via API Particulier + FranceConnect
   - Requires:
     - Legal entity (company/association)
     - Public service mission justification
     - User consent for each data access
     - Habilitation (authorization) from data providers

2. **Form assistance** (preparation only)
   - Gather user information
   - Prefill form fields (on user's device)
   - Guide user through process
   - User completes final submission manually

3. **Document management**
   - Organize supporting documents
   - Generate PDFs for upload
   - Reminder system for deadlines

4. **URSSAF via partners**
   - Use certified accounting software (Indy, Shine, etc.)
   - Semi-automated revenue declaration
   - User must review and approve

### ✅ Recommended Approach for AI Form-Filling Service

#### Tier 1: Information Assistant (LEGAL, LOW-RISK)
- **What it does:**
  - Explains obligations and deadlines
  - Lists required documents
  - Provides procedural guidance
  - Sends reminders
- **Tech:** Chatbot, knowledge base, calendar integration
- **Risk:** None
- **Value:** High for user education

#### Tier 2: Document Preparation Assistant (LEGAL, MODERATE RISK)
- **What it does:**
  - Collects information via conversation
  - Generates prefilled PDF forms (locally)
  - Organizes documents for upload
  - Provides step-by-step instructions
- **Tech:** PDF generation, local storage, structured data collection
- **Risk:** Low (user reviews everything)
- **Value:** Saves time, reduces errors
- **Critical:** User retains full control and final submission

#### Tier 3: Integration Partner (LEGAL, REQUIRES AUTHORIZATION)
- **What it does:**
  - Retrieves user data via APIs (with consent)
  - Autofills forms with verified data
  - Connects to certified accounting software (URSSAF)
  - Provides dashboard of obligations
- **Tech:** API Particulier integration, FranceConnect, partner APIs
- **Requirements:**
  - Legal entity with public service mission or partnership
  - Habilitation from DINUM, DGFiP, CNAM, CNAF
  - Data protection compliance (GDPR, CNIL)
  - Secure infrastructure
- **Risk:** Moderate (regulatory compliance burden)
- **Value:** High automation, official data sources

#### ❌ Tier 4: Automated Submission (ILLEGAL - DO NOT PURSUE)
- **What it would do:** Submit forms on behalf of users without their direct action
- **Why not:**
  - Violates Terms of Service of all platforms
  - Illegal impersonation
  - Criminal liability for errors
  - Technical barriers (CAPTCHA, 2FA, anti-bot)
  - Impossible to maintain (platforms change frequently)

---

## 🔐 FRANCECONNECT INTEGRATION GUIDE (For Authorized Services)

If building an authorized service:

### 1. Eligibility Check
Are you:
- A public administration?
- A local government entity?
- A private company with a public service mission (DSP)?

If NO → Cannot integrate FranceConnect or APIs

### 2. Application Process
1. **Request access:** https://franceconnect.gouv.fr/partenaires
2. **Submit documents:**
   - Legal status proof
   - Service description
   - Data protection impact assessment (AIPD)
   - CNIL compliance documentation
3. **Technical onboarding:**
   - OAuth 2.0 / OpenID Connect integration
   - Sandbox testing
   - Security audit
4. **Production approval**

### 3. API Habilitation (Separate Process)
Each API requires separate authorization:
- **API Impôt Particulier:** Apply via api.gouv.fr
- **API Particulier:** Apply via particulier.api.gouv.fr
- **API Ameli:** Apply via CNAM
- **API CAF:** Apply via CNAF

**Timeline:** 3-6 months for full authorization

---

## 📝 LEGAL & COMPLIANCE CONSIDERATIONS

### GDPR & Data Protection
- **User consent:** Explicit opt-in required for data processing
- **Purpose limitation:** Data used only for stated purpose
- **Data minimization:** Collect only necessary fields
- **Right to erasure:** Users can request data deletion
- **CNIL registration:** May be required depending on processing

### Terms of Service
- **Impots.gouv.fr:** Prohibits automated access (Article 7.2)
- **Ameli.fr:** Prohibits scraping and unauthorized data collection
- **CAF.fr:** Restricts automated form submission
- **URSSAF:** Allows access via certified software only

### Criminal Liability
- **Fraudulent access:** 2 years imprisonment, €60,000 fine (Article 323-1 Code Pénal)
- **Identity fraud:** 1 year, €15,000 fine
- **Tax fraud:** Up to 5 years, €500,000 fine

### Recommendations
- ✅ **Comply fully** with Terms of Service
- ✅ **Obtain authorizations** before API integration
- ✅ **User-driven:** User must explicitly approve all submissions
- ✅ **Transparency:** Clearly explain what the service does and doesn't do
- ❌ **Never:** Submit forms without explicit user action

---

## 🎯 CONCLUSION & VIABLE PRODUCT STRATEGY

### What Users Need (Pain Points)
1. Understanding complex obligations
2. Tracking deadlines
3. Gathering required documents
4. Filling repetitive information across multiple forms
5. Avoiding errors and penalties

### What Technology Can Provide Legally
1. **Education:** Explain obligations in plain language
2. **Organization:** Calendar, reminders, document storage
3. **Efficiency:** Prefill forms with user-provided data (stored locally)
4. **Guidance:** Step-by-step instructions with screenshots
5. **Peace of mind:** Validation checks before user submits

### Viable Product: "AI Administrative Assistant"

**Core Features (No authorization needed):**
- Obligation calendar with smart reminders
- Document checklist generator
- Conversational form assistant (ask questions, AI helps fill locally)
- PDF generator for common forms (prefilled from user input)
- Deadline tracker synced with official calendars
- Multi-platform guide (how to submit on each portal)

**Premium Features (Requires authorization as service provider):**
- FranceConnect integration for identity verification
- API-based data retrieval (tax notice, CAF quotient)
- Direct document upload to compatible platforms
- Partner integration (certified URSSAF software)

**Value Proposition:**
"We prepare everything. You submit with one click."
(User still clicks "submit" on official platforms, but all preparation is done)

---

## 🔗 USEFUL RESOURCES

- **FranceConnect Partners:** https://franceconnect.gouv.fr/partenaires
- **API Particulier:** https://particulier.api.gouv.fr/
- **API Catalog:** https://api.gouv.fr/
- **DINUM (Digital Ministry):** https://www.numerique.gouv.fr/
- **CNIL (Data Protection):** https://www.cnil.fr/
- **Legal Framework:** https://www.legifrance.gouv.fr/
